description: My place is close to Please Don't Tell, Cafe Mogador, Big Gay Ice Cream Shop, and Mighty Quinn's Barbeque. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Charming studio on the hippest street in NYC
review: Lovely, cozy, apartment in a great part of the city.  Everything was very clean and in good working order.  You could hear street noise on a lively Saturday night but I was expecting this and wasn't disturbed by it.  I will definitely stay here again next time I'm in NYC.
